group_1.textLeft: Take care of yourself. Things have been@getting unsafe here lately.

group_1.narration: "Unsafe", huh?@I know she was talking about the strange@people around the complex lately.
She probably means that incident that@happened not too long ago as well.
Daito Ward does have a reputation for having@some of the roughest neighborhoods in@Kamihama, but our complex was always safe.
That incident was scary, and it bothers me.@But what bothers me more is...
...how the atmosphere around here has @changed so much.
These apartments are my home, a place@I hold dear. They're full of memories.
So the thought of those memories@being tainted and ruined is just...

group_1.textRight: You've been staring out there for ages.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, uh, no! Nothing! [chara:301301:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301301:cheek_0][chara:301301:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:301301:lipSynch_1]I was just daydreaming.

group_1.textRight: But Leila, you've been staring into space@since you sat down.
Hey, could you, like, do me a teensy little@favor?
Cleaning duty. Could you do it for me?
Please? Pretty please? I'll treat you to@something if you do it!
[chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yes! I knew I could count on you!

group_1.textLeft: Honestly, you really should tell her off@now and again, you know?
She relies way too much on you for this.

group_1.textRight: I rely on her for everything!

group_1.textLeft: That's not something to brag about.

group_1.textRight: [chara:800100:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]You're an angel, Leila! Thanks so much!

group_1.narration: If I refused, maybe she'd cut me off.@I'm scared of losing friends, that's all.@If I keep doing it for her, nothing changes.
And that's just fine by me.
